Overview

The Document Services Application is a versatile tool designed to process and analyze tabular data from uploaded CSV files. Users can perform various operations such as translation, summarization, and column-specific tasks. This application is ideal for users who need to transform, analyze, or interpret data in multiple formats and languages efficiently.


Key Features

File Upload Functionality

  • Upload CSV files effortlessly.
  • Displays file details such as name and size for verification.

Column Selection

  • Dynamically displays available columns for selection after file upload.
  • Enables users to choose specific columns to apply operations.

Multiple Operations

  • Translation: Translate selected column data into various languages, including French, Spanish, English, and Chinese.
  • Summarization: Generate concise summaries of textual data in the selected columns.

Language Selection

  • Supports multilingual output for translation tasks.
  • Available options: French, Spanish, English, and Chinese.

Output Visualization

  • Displays the results of operations in the "Document Response" section.
  • Allows users to download the output for further use.

Search Functionality

  • Perform a keyword-based search on the uploaded document.
  • Displays search results in the "Search Response" section.


How to Use the Application

Step 1: Upload a CSV File

  1. Click on the "Upload File" section.
  2. Drag and drop your CSV file or use the browse option to select a file from your system.
  3. Verify that the file is loaded correctly with the displayed file name and size.

Step 2: Select Columns

  1. Once the file is loaded, available columns will be displayed in the "Available Columns" section.
  2. Choose one or more columns to apply the desired operations.

Step 3: Choose an Operation

  • Select the type of operation you wish to perform:
  • Translation: Converts text in the selected column into the chosen language.
  • Summarization: Summarizes text data within the selected column.
  • If performing translation, choose the desired language from the options (e.g., French, Spanish).

Step 4: Submit and View Results

  1. Click on the "Submit" button to process the selected operation.
  2. View the output in the "Document Response" section.

Step 5: Search within the Document

  1. Use the "Document Search" section to type keywords or phrases.
  2. Click "Search" to retrieve matching results, displayed in the "Search Response" section.

Step 6: Download Output

  1. After completing an operation, click the "Download" button to save the results locally.


Use Cases

1. Translation of Data

  • Translate product descriptions, customer feedback, or survey responses into multiple languages for global audiences.

2. Text Summarization

  • Summarize large amounts of textual data such as reports, feedback, or logs into concise and readable formats.
